import rx
from rx import of,empty,never,operators as op
source.a12922d0:
empty().subscribe(
    on_next = lambda x : print("result = {0}".format(x)),
    on_error = lambda e : print("result = {0}".format(e)),
    on_completed = lambda: print("completed")
)
source.ee361950:
never().subscribe(
    on_next = lambda x : print("result = {0}".format(x)),
    on_error = lambda e : print("result = {0}".format(e)),
    on_completed = lambda: print("completed")
)
